definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: a chief Babylonian deity (Bab. Bêlu = [[בַּעַל]], lord; Bêl regarded as older form than [[בַּעַל]] by Hpt:Hbr. i. 178; BAS i. 17) = Merodach (cf. [[מרדך]]), tutelary god of Babylon (to be distinguished from older Bêlu, one of ancient Babylonian triad) Je 50:2 (‖[[מְרׂדַח]]) Je 51:44; Is 46:1 (‖[[נְבׂו]])—both writers of Babylonian period;—on Bel v. COT Ge 11:4, Ju Jdg 2:11; Say:Rel. Bab. 103, 110 Jen Kosmologie 24, 134, 307, 391.
